title: Stanisław Zagaja
text:
Stanisław Wojciech Zagaja (11 May 1925 in <a href="Szczurowa">Szczurowa</a>, <a href="Poland">Poland</a> – 17 December 2004 in <a href="Skierniewice">Skierniewice</a>, Poland) was a Polish <a href="Pomology">pomologist</a>, grower of orchard plants. Professor (since 1963) and director (since 1984) of the Research Institute of Pomology and Floriculture in Skierniewice, member of <a href="Polish%20Academy%20of%20Sciences">Polish Academy of Sciences</a> since 1983.
His research was focused on <a href="fruit%20tree">fruit tree</a> breeding, selection and <a href="seed">seed</a> physiology as well as working with <a href="apple">apple</a> vegetative <a href="rootstock">rootstock</a>s, and hybrids of <a href="peach">peach</a> and <a href="cherry">cherry</a>.
